name: Emerging Tech Canvas: Designing useful products in a hype-driven Metaverse world - Supercharge
description:
The Emerging Tech Canvas is a tool for anyone designing and building digital products based on new technologies. Use it to reality-check new product concepts. When media attention produces inflated expectations of new technologies, new technologies get hyped up beyond reality. The canvas isn’t an exhaustive methodology, but it’s great at focussing you and your team and removing the risk of hype-driven development. The outcome of these processes will serve as a reality check; you’ll develop the concept’s scope, gain awareness of market readiness and be able to benchmark competitors.


Before using this tool, we recommend reading about it on our blog here.
